author: timbeiko
content:
**ACDE tomorrow 14:00 UTC**
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/982
Stream: https://youtube.com/live/cSQmbCVwGUk
Will share Zoom here before the call

Following from last week's ACDC, it'd be great if we could use this call to come up with a list of EIPs we want to include in the first Pectra devnets so that we can begin working on those ðŸ˜„ 

There are a bunch of EIPs we'll have brief updates on, and after that it'd be great if client teams could voice their preferences about what we should add to the current Pectra EIPs (https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7600).
